scenes.name: start
text: It is a dark and stormy night.[pause 15]
You stand in a dark room, watching the raindrops hit the window.[pause 15]
[if inv.Newspaper==0]On the table in front of you there is a newspaper. [s1]Novel.js[/s], says the headline.[pause 15][/if]

choices.text: Cut to the chase and check the [s1]Novel.js[/s] GitHub repo

scenes.name: newspaper
text: You pick up the newspaper. What is this "Novel.js" you keep hearing about?[pause 10]
Some kind of text adventure framework, you figure out. And written in JavaScript, no less.

scenes.name: revolver
scenes.text: [if inv.revolver==0]You can't find your revolver! You should probably try harder.[/if][if inv.revolver==1]You found your revolver![/if][if inv.revolver>1][pause 300].[pause 300].[pause 300]. [pause 400].... A second revolver?[/if]
